name: gooey-mulch
effect: Used on a path of soil : Plant will regrow after dying 25% more times.
short_effect: Berries regrow from dead plants an increased number of times.

flavor_text.black_white: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
